product_name: Isis Endura Run Vest - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: On cool, windy days when you want a little extra core protection, zip on the women's Isis Endura Run Vest. This lightweight shell vents and resists wind and water to keep you comfortable. 100% polyester is quick drying. Upper back mesh panel provides active ventilation. Brushed-elastic hem maintains an active fit. Zippered hand pockets secure ID or keys. Reflective details on the women's Isis Endura Run Vest add visibility in low light. Closeout.
short_description: On cool, windy days when you want a little extra core protection, zip on the women's Isis Endura Run Vest. This lightweight shell vents and resists wind and water to keep you comfortable.
